verses.verse: (Maskil of David, when he was in the cave. A Prayer.) I cry <WH2199> aloud <WH2199> with my voice <WH6963> to the Lord; <WH3068> I make <WH2603> supplication <WH2603> with my voice <WH6963> to the Lord. <WH3068>
I pour <WH8210> out my complaint <WH7879> before <WH6440> Him; I declare <WH5046> my trouble <WH6869> before <WH6440> Him.

When my spirit <WH7307> was overwhelmed <WH5848> within <WH5921> me, Thou didst know <WH3045> my path. <WH9350> In the way <WH734> where <WH2098> I walk <WH1980> They have hidden <WH2934> a trap <WH6341> for me.

Look <WH5027> to the right <WH3225> and see; <WH7200> For there <WH369> is no <WH369> one <WH369> who regards <WH5234> me; There is no escape <WH6> for me; No <WH4498> one <WH369> cares <WH369> for my soul. <WH1875>
I cried <WH2199> out to Thee, O Lord; <WH3068> I said, <WH559> "Thou art my refuge, <WH4268> My portion <WH2506> in the land <WH776> of the living. <WH2416>

"Give <WH7181> heed <WH7181> to my cry, <WH7440> For I am brought <WH1809> very <WH3966> low; <WH1809> Deliver <WH5337> me from my persecutors, <WH7291> For they are too <WH4480> strong <WH553> for me.

"Bring <WH3318> my soul <WH5315> out of prison, <WH4525> So that I may give <WH3034> thanks <WH3034> to Thy name; <WH8034> The righteous <WH6662> will surround <WH3803> me, For Thou wilt deal <WH1580> bountifully <WH1580> with me."
